Hesed of the Black Anvil Guild:
I am Hesed of the Black Anvil Guild who proudly trains excellent artisans and warsmiths! On a really important mission, I came to the Isle of Souls.
Have you travelled on a ship? The seasickness... It was so terrible. On your way here, did you see any big ships? Yes! That's the one. I was surprised that even a big ship like that shook that much. My life here is hard and lonely, but just thinking about my trip back on that ship, I feel seasick...
